summary: Comprehensive frontend testing completed for Sha Smart Home website updates. All major features working correctly except product images from Google Drive URLs are not loading.

ui_bugs.issue: Product images from Google Drive URLs not loading - showing placeholder letters instead
ui_bugs.details: Google Drive direct link format (https://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=...) is not rendering images. Images are hidden and fallback placeholder letters (S, N) are shown.

action_items: Fix product images - Google Drive URLs not loading. Consider using alternative image hosting (Unsplash, Cloudinary, or direct URLs) or fix Google Drive sharing permissions
critical_code_review_comments: data-testid attributes properly implemented on all interactive elements
Theme toggle works correctly between dark and light modes
seed_data_creation: N/A - All data is MOCKED via /app/frontend/src/mock.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features tested. Product images from Google Drive not loading - this is the only issue found. All other features working correctly.

mobile_header_brand_visibility.notes: Mobile header shows 'Sha' logo with 'by Mahadeva Systems' clearly visible

products_page_category_tabs.notes: Category tabs (All Products, Control Panels, Control Modules) show without scrolling, proper flex-wrap implemented

active_nav_highlighting.notes: Navigation highlights active page with opposite color (bg-black dark:bg-white text-white dark:text-black)

product_card_scroll_to_top.notes: Clicking product cards scrolls to top of detail page (scroll position: 0)

contact_us_for_pricing_scroll.notes: Contact Us for Pricing button navigates to Contact page and scrolls to top

contact_page_info.notes: Contact page shows correct email (smarthomeautomations25@gmail.com) and phone (+918500570590)

footer_opposite_colors.notes: Footer has opposite colors - bg-black dark:bg-white (black bg in light mode, white bg in dark mode)

solutions_hover_shadow.notes: Solutions cards have hover shadow effect: hover:shadow-xl dark:hover:shadow-[0_20px_50px_rgba(255,255,255,0.15)]

about_page_india_map.notes: About page shows India map infographic with Telangana, Andhra Pradesh highlighted, Hyderabad (HQ) marker, New Delhi reference point, and legend

hero_carousel_mock_data.notes: Hero carousel uses 3 slides from mock data (SMART TOUCH PANELS, INTELLIGENT LIGHTING, ADVANCED SECURITY)

footer_social_links.notes: All social links correct: YouTube (@MahadevaSystems), LinkedIn (mahadeva-systems), Facebook (mahadevasystems), Instagram (_the_sha_25_), Twitter (mahadevasys)

product_images_google_drive.notes: Product images from Google Drive URLs NOT loading - showing placeholder letters instead. Google Drive uc?export=view format not working.

mocked_apis_note: ALL DATA IS MOCKED via /app/frontend/src/mock.js - No backend integration. Contact form submission, chatbot responses, and all product data are mocked.
